source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

Focus on Project Cost Risks issues in Construction
Estimating and Cost planning

items.title: Develop and Manage Resources (PMI - PMP)
items.headline: Project Management Professional Certification Program (PMI-PMP)
objectives_summary: Identify the inputs to the Develop Team process
Recognize the tools and techniques you can use to develop teams
Recognize the relationship between the use of team-building exercises and the normal development of a team

items.title: PMP® One Exam - PMBOK 6 Edition
items.headline: 200 Questions with detailed explanation according to the PMBOK® Guide, 6th Edition.
objectives_summary: Practice on solving PMP Exam questions according to PMBOK Guide 6 Edition

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Planning and Monitoring Iterations
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program - Course 5 of 8 - Planning and Monitoring Iterations
objectives_summary: Understand activities that take place during an iteration planning meeting, identify the outputs of the iteration planning meeting
Recognize the steps for creating an iteration backlog,  calculate the buffer for a given set of project tasks, and pinpoint the appropriate actions to take
Recognize the tools are used to monitor progress during an iteration

items.title: Project Initiation and Planning (PMI-PMP)
items.headline: Project Management Professional Certification Program (PMI-PMP)
objectives_summary: Describe the role of Project Integration Management in a project
Recognize relationships and interactions within the Project Integration Management processes
Recognize the relationship between the project charter and the project management plan

items.headline: A beginners' guide
objectives_summary: What are the Vision, Mission, Goals and Objectives statements
How to use balance scorecard and KPI tree
Learn to develop strategic objectives

items.title: Real World Project Management For Beginners: Detailed Course
items.headline: Learn scheduling, budgeting, risk management, earned value, change management based on PMI & PMP projects standards.
objectives_summary: Manage projects effectively and successfully as per PMI-USA standards.
Create detailed project plans with detailed scope statement and WBS.
Create realistic schedule & budget for your project.

objectives_summary: 1. Comprehensive Steps to learn and apply Deltek Acumen Fuse Diagnostic Techniques
2.	A Brief Overview Acumen Fuse
3.	Navigating the Acumen Fuse Workspace

items.title: Project Management for Technical Writers

visible_instructors.job_title: WE TEACH SOFTWARE DOCUMENTATION AND DITA! 28K+ Students!
visible_instructors.name: JPDocu
visible_instructors.title: JPDocu School of Technical Writing

items.headline: Lean how to efficiently organize your work as a tech writer.
objectives_summary: Define the scope of the user guide
Plan the content of the user guide, so that it meets requirements of your stakeholders
Prioritize the order of creating the content of the user guide

items.title: Mastering Pre-Construction/Project Management
items.headline: Mastering Pre-Construction/Project Management
objectives_summary: Understand the process of pre construction management
The role of a Construction/project manager and the skills you need to set yourself apart in the construction project management field
Procurement and project delivery methods

items.title: Compare Project Management Software 2019
items.headline: We take a look inside the top project management tools including Monday, Wrike, Basecamp, Trello, Asana, Teamwork & More
objectives_summary: Know what major hosted project management software systems are available
Have a good idea of the layout of each software system
Be able to access quickly the information they need to further evaluate the software for their business

items.title: Planning Stakeholder Engagement (PMI - PMP)
items.headline: Project Management Professional Certification Program (PMI-PMP)
objectives_summary: Recognize examples of stakeholders
Recognize the inputs of the Identify Stakeholders process
Distinguish between the tools and techniques you use for identifying stakeholders

items.title: How To Design & Fund International Development NGO Projects

visible_instructors.name: Tim
visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Director, Center for Sustainable Development
visible_instructors.title: Tim Magee

items.headline: Train for career change, job search, or promotion; boost proposal writing & project management skill sets to raise funds
objectives_summary: The course has been developed so that YOU can design a real, international development project, in real time, and package it in preparation for sharing with a donor. So you won't just be learning how to do this, you will complete this course with a finished product ready to request funding.

This course provides a system for you to use in developing successful projects and includes the tools needed to assess and organize information about challenges that communities face, approach funding organizations, work side-by-side with communities to develop long-term, sustainable programs, empower communities to take full charge of programs once up and running.

items.title: Scrum & Agile Masterclass: Become a Scrum Master; PSM1 Test

visible_instructors.job_title: Project manager, Agile Coach, Scrum Master
visible_instructors.name: Niels
visible_instructors.display_name: Niels Rabe | Agile Coach, Project manager, Scrum Master
visible_instructors.title: Niels Rabe | Agile Coach, Project manager, Scrum Master

items.headline: Practical approach to Scrum, based on the Scrum Guide, including deep dives agile templates, exercises and experiences!
objectives_summary: Deep Dive into Scrum and Agile
Everything you need to know to pass your Scrum Master certification, including a "cheat sheet" for PSM 1
Advanced insights into lessons learned from real Scrum projects

items.title: PMP® Exam Practice Test-1000 questions+ 400 FREE Questions
items.headline: High Quality PMP questions to conquer the PMP® certification exam|PMP Exam Practice test |Pass PMP exam in 1st attempt.
objectives_summary: Acquire the knowledge and skills you need to pass the PMP® certification exam
Understand the concepts by practicing real time questions by knowledge area
Practice and Experience PMP® simulation exams.
